attributes.action: Use the internet to have a referendum on an important subjects
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When a decision needs to be made about something of public interest that is beyond the scope of a few members of parliament, a referendum on the Internet would be far cheaper than setting up voting stations, and all that follows entails. a typical example would be the decisions made by the european parliament that effects us here in the U K
